segments.text: We ’ re asking for donations today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you collecting donations for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re trying to raise money for the campaigns .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much are you planning on raising ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of fundraisers are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are going door to door .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should try actual fundraisers , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try having a car wash or selling candy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn ’ t think of that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . It ’ ll also help you make more money .
segments.speaker: S2
